newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech cbank O/N repo tenders both hit maximum rate.
newsitem.headline: Czech cbank O/N repo tenders both hit maximum rate.

text.p: The Czech central bank's (CNB) two overnight repo tenders were sold out at the maximum rate of 45 percent, the CNB said in a statement.
The first tender is for the period from May 20-21, while the second was from May 21-22.
The CNB holds repo tenders to either supply or drain liquidity from the market almost daily.

On Friday the CNB raised its Lombard rate to 50 percent from a previous 14 percent, in an attempt to support the crown, which had fallen to record lows of below five percent against its basket parity during the week as investors sold short positions to push the currency down.
